description:
WARNING!!! If you have already enrolled for our course "Be A Great Manager. Build Your Career. Earn More Money" Then you DO NOT need to enroll for this one as it is a part of our large 10 hour course.

This short 50 min. course will provide you with a set of instruments and solutions for effective conflict resolution developed inside IBM corporation for internal use. Now you can use these instruments as well!

In 50 minutes of this course you will find out:

  • What “Constructive” and “Non-Constructive” terms mean
  • 4 Principles of Constructiveness according to IBM corporate policy
  • 4 stage conflict resolution instrument
  • Every stage thorough discussion and studying
  • Solutions for real life cases and conflicts scenarios

The course consists of 1 section and 3 lectures.

The Video part you will cover in 50 minutes.

The Homework part may take you several hours to complete.

______________________________________________________________________

Pricing: $9 is an introductory price.

It is about to change to $19 very soon and later even to $39.

So take your chance to enroll for this super attractive price before time runs out!
______________________________________________________________________
title: Solve Financial Conflicts
